long_description: OnGuard Akita Seat Leash cable helps keep your saddle secure when you lock up your bicycle. Flexible 5mm-thick steel cable features convenient, permanent loops for easy locking; vinyl coating helps protect your bike's finish. OnGuard rates the Akita cable as a 20 out of 100 on their 100-point security rating system, where higher-rated locks offer increased security. Please note: lock sold separately.
short_description: OnGuard Akita Seat Leash cable helps keep your saddle secure when you lock up your bicycle.
